name: AlpEt Steakhouse
description: Distinguished steakhouse specializing in 28-day dry-aged meats, served in an elegant setting with a garden backdrop. A premier destination for meat lovers in Ashgabat.

menuHighlights.name: Dry-Aged Ribeye (400g)
menuHighlights.description: 28-day aged beef ribeye, charcoal-grilled to perfection.

menuHighlights.name: T-Bone Steak
menuHighlights.description: Premium cut with herb butter and seasonal vegetables.

menuHighlights.name: Lamb Chops
menuHighlights.description: Grilled lamb chops with rosemary jus and mashed potatoes.

menuHighlights.name: Caesar Salad
menuHighlights.description: Classic Caesar with parmesan, croutons and anchovy dressing.

aiSummary: Top-tier steakhouse with dry-aging expertise; ideal for business dinners and special occasions.

name: Hezzet Restaurant
description: Highly regarded dining complex offering Turkmen and Turkish cuisine in a welcoming atmosphere, with dining available in traditional yurt-like tents surrounded by greenery.

menuHighlights.name: Turkmen Plov
menuHighlights.description: Traditional rice pilaf with lamb, carrots, and aromatic spices.

menuHighlights.name: Shashlik Platter
menuHighlights.description: Assorted grilled meats including lamb, beef, and chicken.

menuHighlights.name: Manty
menuHighlights.description: Steamed dumplings filled with spiced lamb and onion.

menuHighlights.name: Turkmen Chörba
menuHighlights.description: Hearty lamb soup with vegetables and herbs.

aiSummary: Authentic Turkmen dining experience with yurt seating and generous portions; great for families and groups.

name: Joshgun Palow House
description: Beloved traditional restaurant specializing in over 20 varieties of plov (pilaf), from classic lamb to festive Ishlekli, served in a cozy and homey atmosphere.

menuHighlights.name: Classic Turkmen Palow
menuHighlights.description: Traditional lamb plov with caramelized carrots and cumin.

menuHighlights.name: Ishlekli
menuHighlights.description: Festive meat pie baked in tandoor with spiced lamb filling.

menuHighlights.name: Chicken Palow
menuHighlights.description: Aromatic rice with tender chicken and dried fruits.

menuHighlights.name: Gutap
menuHighlights.description: Thin flatbread stuffed with lamb, spinach, or pumpkin.

menuHighlights.name: Green Tea
menuHighlights.description: Traditional Turkmen çaý served in a porcelain bowl.

aiSummary: The definitive plov destination in Ashgabat with 20+ varieties; a must-visit for authentic Turkmen cuisine.

name: Chatma Restaurant & Lounge
description: One of Ashgabat's oldest and most charming restaurants, offering traditional dishes amidst abundant foliage with a well-stocked bar and relaxed atmosphere.

menuHighlights.name: Fried Manty
menuHighlights.description: Crispy pan-fried dumplings with yogurt and garlic sauce.

menuHighlights.name: Khachapuri
menuHighlights.description: Georgian cheese bread baked in traditional clay oven.

menuHighlights.name: Grilled Lamb Kebab
menuHighlights.description: Charcoal-grilled lamb skewers with fresh herbs and onions.

menuHighlights.name: Mixed Salad Platter
menuHighlights.description: Fresh seasonal vegetables with pomegranate dressing.

aiSummary: Historic restaurant with lush garden seating and a well-stocked bar; perfect for relaxed evening dining.

name: Central Park Restaurant
description: Two-story restaurant offering stunning night views of Ashgabat, serving Turkish and Italian cuisine with live music, chef shows, and a dedicated kids' menu.

menuHighlights.name: Margherita Pizza
menuHighlights.description: Wood-fired pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil.

menuHighlights.name: Iskender Kebab
menuHighlights.description: Sliced döner over bread with tomato sauce and melted butter.

menuHighlights.name: Pasta Carbonara
menuHighlights.description: Creamy egg-based sauce with pancetta and parmesan.

menuHighlights.name: Turkish Baklava
menuHighlights.description: Layers of flaky pastry with pistachios and sweet syrup.

aiSummary: Great for families seeking panoramic city views with reliable Turkish-Italian fusion and entertainment.

name: Miras Restaurant
description: Upscale dining spot offering an elegant interpretation of traditional Turkmen cuisine with a modern interior, known for innovative dishes and artistic presentation.

menuHighlights.name: Deconstructed Plov
menuHighlights.description: Modern take on traditional pilaf with saffron-infused rice.

menuHighlights.name: Lamb Tenderloin
menuHighlights.description: Sous-vide lamb with pomegranate reduction and herb crust.

menuHighlights.name: Sturgeon Fillet
menuHighlights.description: Pan-seared Caspian sturgeon with almond cream sauce.

menuHighlights.name: Rose Pistachio Baklava
menuHighlights.description: Delicate layers with rosewater syrup and crushed pistachios.

aiSummary: Sophisticated reinterpretation of Turkmen classics with artistic plating; ideal for special occasions.

name: Nusay Restaurant
description: Opulent dining experience with a majestic atmosphere inspired by Turkmenistan's regal heritage, featuring royal-style cuisine and exquisite interior craftsmanship.

menuHighlights.name: Royal Lamb Plov
menuHighlights.description: Festive pilaf with lamb, dried fruits, and golden raisins.

menuHighlights.name: Stuffed Quail
menuHighlights.description: Herb-stuffed quail with walnut and pomegranate sauce.

menuHighlights.name: Kavurma
menuHighlights.description: Slow-braised lamb with tomatoes, onion, and pepper.

menuHighlights.name: Şerbetli Dessert
menuHighlights.description: Traditional syrup-soaked pastry with clotted cream.

aiSummary: Grand venue channeling Turkmen royal heritage; excellent for celebrations and official dinners.

name: Arzu Restaurant
description: Known for impeccable service and a menu that blends traditional Turkmen cuisine with contemporary flair, set in a chic modern-designed interior.

menuHighlights.name: Turkmen Laghman
menuHighlights.description: Hand-pulled noodles with stir-fried lamb and vegetables.

menuHighlights.name: Grilled Beef Medallions
menuHighlights.description: Pan-seared beef with mushroom sauce and roasted potatoes.

menuHighlights.name: Çekdirme
menuHighlights.description: Traditional fried meat with tomato, egg, and green pepper.

menuHighlights.name: Honey Walnut Cake
menuHighlights.description: Layered cake with honey cream and crushed walnuts.

aiSummary: Contemporary Turkmen dining with efficient business lunch service; a reliable choice for expats and locals.

name: Altyn Çyraý
description: Exquisite restaurant blending local Turkmen dishes with international cuisine, featuring traditional decor, live music performances, and exceptional service.

menuHighlights.name: Lamb Tandoor
menuHighlights.description: Slow-roasted lamb in traditional clay oven with herbs.

menuHighlights.name: Caspian Sturgeon
menuHighlights.description: Grilled sturgeon with lemon butter and saffron rice.

menuHighlights.name: Mixed Grill Platter
menuHighlights.description: Assortment of lamb, beef, and chicken kebabs.

menuHighlights.name: Kunefe
menuHighlights.description: Crispy shredded pastry with melted cheese and sweet syrup.

aiSummary: Premium dining with live entertainment and traditional Turkmen ambiance; great for evening celebrations.

name: Balykchy Restaurant
description: Ashgabat's premier seafood destination featuring fresh Caspian fish preparations, grilled specialties, and a refined maritime-themed interior.

menuHighlights.name: Grilled Caspian Kutum
menuHighlights.description: Whole grilled Caspian fish with lemon, herbs, and capers.

menuHighlights.name: Seafood Plov
menuHighlights.description: Rice pilaf with shrimp, mussels, and saffron.

menuHighlights.name: Fish Kebab
menuHighlights.description: Skewered sturgeon pieces with vegetables and pomegranate glaze.

menuHighlights.name: Grilled Trout
menuHighlights.description: Rainbow trout with garlic butter and almond flakes.

aiSummary: Top choice for seafood lovers; features Caspian-sourced fish with traditional preparation methods.

name: Şirin Restaurant
description: Sophisticated restaurant featuring Eastern European cuisines with Asian influences, ideal for business lunches and special occasions. Renowned for sturgeon dishes and caviar.

menuHighlights.name: Sturgeon with Caviar
menuHighlights.description: Pan-seared sturgeon topped with Caspian caviar.

menuHighlights.name: Chicken Kiev
menuHighlights.description: Classic breaded chicken breast with garlic herb butter.

menuHighlights.name: Beef Stroganoff
menuHighlights.description: Tender beef strips in creamy mushroom sauce with rice.

menuHighlights.name: Napoleon Cake
menuHighlights.description: Layered puff pastry with custard cream.

aiSummary: Refined European-Asian crossover with signature sturgeon and caviar; strong business lunch program.

name: Dag Lezzeti Restaurant
description: Authentic mountain-style Turkmen restaurant offering hearty grilled meats and traditional dishes, providing a culinary journey through the flavors of the Kopet Dag foothills.

menuHighlights.name: Tamdyrlama
menuHighlights.description: Lamb baked in a tandoor oven with potatoes and onions.

menuHighlights.name: Dograma
menuHighlights.description: Traditional bread soup with lamb broth and dried bread.

menuHighlights.name: Beef Shashlik
menuHighlights.description: Charcoal-grilled beef skewers with sumac and fresh herbs.

menuHighlights.name: Yarma Soup
menuHighlights.description: Thick grain soup with lamb and root vegetables.

aiSummary: Affordable and hearty Turkmen comfort food with generous portions; authentic mountain dining experience.

name: Sha Coffee
description: Pioneer of Ashgabat's specialty coffee culture, offering freshly roasted high-quality beans alongside European, American, and Turkmen cuisine in a trendy setting.

menuHighlights.name: Flat White
menuHighlights.description: Double ristretto with velvety steamed milk.

menuHighlights.name: Avocado Toast
menuHighlights.description: Sourdough toast with smashed avocado, feta, and chili flakes.

menuHighlights.name: Club Sandwich
menuHighlights.description: Triple-decker with chicken, bacon, egg, and fresh vegetables.

menuHighlights.name: Tiramisu
menuHighlights.description: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked savoiardi.

aiSummary: The go-to specialty coffee shop in Ashgabat with fresh roasts and a work-friendly atmosphere.

name: Uzum Cafe
description: Cozy neighborhood cafe with a diverse international menu including salads, soups, pasta, and hot dishes. Conveniently located across from the Ak Altyn Hotel.

location.address: Magtymguly şaýoly, near Ak Altyn Hotel

menuHighlights.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
menuHighlights.description: Grilled chicken, romaine, parmesan, and house-made dressing.

menuHighlights.name: Tomato Basil Soup
menuHighlights.description: Creamy tomato soup with fresh basil and croutons.

menuHighlights.name: Penne Arrabbiata
menuHighlights.description: Al dente pasta with spicy tomato sauce and parmesan.

menuHighlights.name: Signature Tea Menu
menuHighlights.description: Selection of fruit, herbal, and Turkmen green teas.

aiSummary: Reliable international cafe near major hotels; solid breakfast and lunch spot for visitors.

name: Frappe Coffee
description: Modern coffee shop with classic and creative drink options, including signature Bumblebee coffee, unusual lemonades, milkshakes, and artisan desserts.

menuHighlights.name: Bumblebee Coffee
menuHighlights.description: Signature honey-vanilla espresso with layered cream.

menuHighlights.name: Almond Croissant
menuHighlights.description: Buttery croissant filled with almond cream and toasted flakes.

menuHighlights.name: Mango Lemonade
menuHighlights.description: Fresh mango blended with sparkling lemonade and mint.

menuHighlights.name: Pistachio Cake
menuHighlights.description: Moist pistachio sponge with cream cheese frosting.

aiSummary: Instagram-ready cafe with creative drink menu and excellent pastries; perfect for afternoon visits.

name: Talhan Bakery
description: Cozy cafe-bakery famous for fresh pastries, delicious desserts, and a menu spanning Turkish and European cuisine. Also offers custom cakes to order.

menuHighlights.name: Simit with Cheese
menuHighlights.description: Turkish sesame ring bread with cream cheese and olives.

menuHighlights.name: Chocolate Eclair
menuHighlights.description: Choux pastry filled with vanilla cream and chocolate glaze.

menuHighlights.name: Turkish Breakfast Plate
menuHighlights.description: Eggs, cheese, olives, tomatoes, honey, and fresh bread.

menuHighlights.name: Red Velvet Cake
menuHighlights.description: Classic red velvet with cream cheese frosting.

aiSummary: Beloved bakery with fresh morning pastries and custom cakes; ideal for breakfast or a sweet treat.

name: Kemine Coffee
description: Popular neighborhood coffee shop known for early opening hours, delicious fresh pastries, an impressive coffee selection, and consistently friendly service.

menuHighlights.name: Cappuccino
menuHighlights.description: Rich espresso with perfectly steamed milk foam.

menuHighlights.name: Butter Croissant
menuHighlights.description: Flaky and golden, baked fresh every morning.

menuHighlights.name: Iced Latte
menuHighlights.description: Chilled espresso with cold milk over ice.

menuHighlights.name: Cinnamon Roll
menuHighlights.description: Warm spiral bun with cinnamon sugar and cream cheese glaze.

aiSummary: Best early-bird coffee spot in Ashgabat; opens at 6:30 AM with fresh pastries and friendly service.

name: Tigirli Coffee
description: Stylish cafe offering a wide selection of hot and cold coffee drinks, signature teas, milkshakes, smoothies, and artisan desserts in a trendy atmosphere.

menuHighlights.name: Matcha Latte
menuHighlights.description: Japanese matcha with steamed oat or whole milk.

menuHighlights.name: Berry Smoothie
menuHighlights.description: Blended strawberry, blueberry, banana, and yogurt.

menuHighlights.name: French Tart
menuHighlights.description: Seasonal fruit tart with vanilla pastry cream.

menuHighlights.name: Meringue Roll
menuHighlights.description: Crispy meringue rolled with whipped cream and berries.

aiSummary: Trendy cafe with wide beverage selection and artisan desserts; great for studying or catching up.

name: Uno Coffee & Tea
description: Specialty tea and coffee house known for classic and iced drinks, signature teas, lemonades, and Chinese tea varieties. Offers alternative milk options.

menuHighlights.name: Chinese Oolong Tea
menuHighlights.description: Premium loose-leaf oolong served in a traditional set.

menuHighlights.name: Rose Lemonade
menuHighlights.description: Sparkling lemonade with rose syrup and fresh mint.

menuHighlights.name: Oat Milk Latte
menuHighlights.description: Espresso with creamy oat milk and a touch of vanilla.

menuHighlights.name: Honey Cake Slice
menuHighlights.description: Traditional layered honey cake with sour cream frosting.

aiSummary: Tea-forward cafe with impressive variety including Chinese specialty teas; plant-milk options available.

name: Berk Garden Pub
description: Spacious garden pub on Gorogly Street with an outdoor pool, barbecue zone, and relaxed atmosphere — a popular spot for evening gatherings and celebrations.

menuHighlights.name: BBQ Ribs
menuHighlights.description: Slow-smoked pork ribs with house BBQ sauce and coleslaw.

menuHighlights.name: Grilled Chicken Wings
menuHighlights.description: Charcoal-grilled wings with spicy garlic sauce.

menuHighlights.name: Garden Burger
menuHighlights.description: Beef patty with cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

menuHighlights.name: Draft Beer
menuHighlights.description: Selection of local and imported draft beers.

aiSummary: Casual garden pub with pool and BBQ; great for group gatherings and evening entertainment.

name: Kopetdag Project
description: Contemporary restaurant on Magtymguly Avenue blending traditional Turkmen flavors with modern cooking techniques, featuring private yurt-type cabins, a charming garden area, and a diverse menu.

menuHighlights.name: Kebab Platter
menuHighlights.description: Assorted grilled lamb & beef kebabs with fresh herbs and lavash.

menuHighlights.name: Turkmen Plov
menuHighlights.description: Aromatic rice pilaf with tender lamb and caramelized carrots.

menuHighlights.name: Fresh Salad Bar
menuHighlights.description: Seasonal vegetables with pomegranate vinaigrette.

menuHighlights.name: Baklava Dessert
menuHighlights.description: Layers of flaky pastry with pistachios and honey syrup.

aiSummary: Contemporary Turkmen dining with yurt cabins and garden seating; great blend of tradition and modernity.

name: Altyn Paradise Garden
description: Enchanting garden restaurant with beautiful outdoor gazebos, live music, and water features. Serves traditional Turkmen dishes, steaks, and wood-fired pizza in a lush setting.

menuHighlights.name: Garden Steak
menuHighlights.description: Charcoal-grilled ribeye served with grilled vegetables.

menuHighlights.name: Wood-Fired Pizza
menuHighlights.description: Thin-crust pizza baked in traditional stone oven.

menuHighlights.name: Aromatic Kebab
menuHighlights.description: Lamb kebab marinated with herbs and served with rice.

menuHighlights.name: Fruit Platter
menuHighlights.description: Seasonal fresh fruits beautifully presented.

aiSummary: Enchanting garden oasis with gazebos and live music; perfect for outdoor dining and celebrations.

name: Sazak Restaurant
description: Elegant restaurant skillfully blending Turkmen culinary traditions with modern tastes, offering grilled meats and seafood in a picturesque setting with décor paying homage to ancient Turkmen culture.

menuHighlights.name: Sazak Special Lamb
menuHighlights.description: Slow-roasted lamb shoulder with dried apricots and almonds.

menuHighlights.name: Grilled Sturgeon
menuHighlights.description: Caspian sturgeon fillet with saffron butter sauce.

menuHighlights.name: Mixed Grill Platter
menuHighlights.description: Selection of lamb, beef, and chicken cooked over charcoal.

menuHighlights.name: Turkmen Honey Dessert
menuHighlights.description: Traditional pastry layers with mountain honey and walnuts.

aiSummary: Elegant blend of tradition and modernity with cultural décor; excellent grilled meats and Caspian seafood.

name: Aşgabat Kafesi
description: Cozy café-style restaurant capturing the essence of Turkmen cuisine with timeless recipes, offering a casual and welcoming atmosphere for both locals and visitors.

menuHighlights.name: Turkmen Breakfast
menuHighlights.description: Eggs, fresh bread, cheese, jam, and traditional green tea.

menuHighlights.name: Çekdirme
menuHighlights.description: Traditional fried meat with tomatoes, eggs, and peppers.

menuHighlights.name: Gutap Set
menuHighlights.description: Three varieties: lamb, pumpkin, and greens.

menuHighlights.name: Gök Çaý
menuHighlights.description: Endless pot of traditional Turkmen green tea.

aiSummary: Authentic casual Turkmen café with timeless recipes and affordable prices; a local favorite.

name: Coffee'Chi
description: Cozy café offering a wide variety of espresso drinks, cappuccinos, flat whites, raff coffee, hot chocolate, cold drinks, affogatos, frappuccinos, breakfast options, and artisan desserts.

menuHighlights.name: Raff Coffee
menuHighlights.description: Creamy espresso with vanilla and frothed cream.

menuHighlights.name: Affogato
menuHighlights.description: Vanilla gelato drowned in a shot of hot espresso.

menuHighlights.name: Breakfast Bagel
menuHighlights.description: Toasted bagel with cream cheese, avocado, and smoked salmon.

menuHighlights.name: Chocolate Fondant
menuHighlights.description: Warm chocolate cake with molten center and vanilla ice cream.

aiSummary: Charming café with wide espresso variety and breakfast options; cozy spot for morning routines.

name: Bazetti Coffee
description: Cozy coffee shop inside the Berkarar Shopping Center known for its home-like atmosphere, great selection of specialty drinks, generously sized cake slices, and relaxing ambiance.

menuHighlights.name: Bazetti Signature Latte
menuHighlights.description: House blend espresso with caramel and steamed milk.

menuHighlights.name: Napoleon Cake Slice
menuHighlights.description: Generous portion of layered puff pastry with custard cream.

menuHighlights.name: Hot Chocolate
menuHighlights.description: Rich Belgian chocolate with whipped cream.

menuHighlights.name: Fruit Cheesecake
menuHighlights.description: New York cheesecake topped with seasonal berries.

aiSummary: Cozy café in Berkarar mall with generous cake portions; perfect for a shopping break.

name: Melbourne Coffee
description: Trendy specialty coffee shop inside the Berkarar Shopping Center inspired by Melbourne's famous café culture, offering artisan roasts and modern brewing methods.

menuHighlights.name: V60 Pour-Over
menuHighlights.description: Single-origin beans brewed with Hario V60 method.

menuHighlights.name: Cold Brew
menuHighlights.description: 12-hour steeped cold brew served over ice.

menuHighlights.name: Banana Bread
menuHighlights.description: Moist banana bread with walnuts, served warm.

menuHighlights.name: Flat White
menuHighlights.description: Double ristretto with silky microfoam milk.

aiSummary: Melbourne-inspired specialty coffee with pour-over bar; best third-wave coffee experience in Ashgabat.

name: Bakery Aziza & Leyla
description: Popular bakery and dessert shop offering a wide range of fresh pastries, mini cream-filled baskets, fruit pies, baklava, cakes, cupcakes, marshmallows, waffles, and quality coffee drinks.

menuHighlights.name: Mini Cream Baskets
menuHighlights.description: Tiny pastry baskets filled with vanilla or chocolate cream.

menuHighlights.name: Berry Tart
menuHighlights.description: Buttery tart shell with custard and fresh mixed berries.

menuHighlights.name: Pistachio Baklava
menuHighlights.description: Crispy phyllo layers with pistachios and rose syrup.

menuHighlights.name: Iced Latte
menuHighlights.description: Chilled espresso with cold milk and vanilla syrup.

aiSummary: Dessert paradise with incredible pastry variety; must-visit for baklava and cream basket lovers.

name: On Café
description: Stylish and modern café perfect for morning coffee or a leisurely lunch, with a curated menu of specialty coffee, light meals, and a photogenic interior popular on social media.

menuHighlights.name: Eggs Benedict
menuHighlights.description: Poached eggs with hollandaise sauce on toasted English muffin.

menuHighlights.name: Açaí Bowl
menuHighlights.description: Blended açaí topped with granola, banana, and honey.

menuHighlights.name: Smoked Salmon Croissant
menuHighlights.description: Warm croissant with smoked salmon, cream cheese, and capers.

menuHighlights.name: Lavender Latte
menuHighlights.description: Espresso with steamed milk and house lavender syrup.

aiSummary: Stylish brunch destination with photogenic interior; popular with young professionals and creatives.

name: A-Coffee
description: Budget-friendly neighborhood coffee spot known for quick service, consistent quality espresso drinks, and a loyal local following. A reliable everyday coffee stop.

menuHighlights.name: Americano
menuHighlights.description: Double shot espresso with hot water.

menuHighlights.name: Cappuccino
menuHighlights.description: Classic cappuccino with thick foam.

menuHighlights.name: Chocolate Muffin
menuHighlights.description: Freshly baked double chocolate muffin.

menuHighlights.name: Iced Americano
menuHighlights.description: Chilled espresso over ice with cold water.

aiSummary: No-frills everyday coffee stop with the best prices in town; loyal local following.
